data.title: Elton Brand Named General Manager
data.meta_description: 17-YEAR NBA VETERAN AND TWO-TIME ALL-STAR ELTON BRAND NAMED GENERAL MANAGER OF PHILADELPHIA 76ERS ALEX RUCKER ELEVATED TO EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT OF BASKETBALL OPERATIONS PHILADELPHIA – SEPT. 20, 2018 — Philadelphia 76ers Managing Partner Josh Harris and Co-Managing Partner David Blitzer announced today that Elton Brand has been named the team’s General Manager. Additionally, Alex Rucker has been elevated to Executive Vice President of Basketball Operations.
